  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The forklift driver entered the pallet with his forks tilted up which stabbed the box from underneath, consequently damaging the cans inside the boxes. Absorbent pads and quick dry were placed in the area to control and absorb spilled material. Damaged containers were placed into overpack pails in preparation for disposition.
